title: One: Kagayaku Kisetsu e - True Stories
synopsis: In 1998 winter, another world happens to come to existence in me, though I used to be a normal student. It is covering my ordinary life as the snow covers the ground. Until then, I haven't noticed, what has stayed unchanged in my daily life, the familiar scenes that have always been there, the warmth of the person whom I haven't noticed that I love her.
characters: ['Nagamori, Mizuka', 'Kawana, Misaki', 'Satomura, Akane', 'Kouzuki, Mio', 'Nanase, Rumi', 'Shiina, Mayu']
staff: [['Hinoue, Itaru', ['Original Character Design']], ['Hisaya, Naoki', ['Original Creator']], ['Katsumata, Geki', ['Art Director']]]
